parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the asset to retrieve or modify.

parameters.name: locationCode
parameters.description: Code representing the location or site where the asset is stored or used.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the asset (e.g., Active, Inactive, Maintenance).

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category/type of the asset (e.g., Vehicle, Equipment, Furniture).

parameters.name: assignedTo
parameters.description: The user ID or name of the person responsible for the asset.
